name: xbrowsersync-api
description: The REST API service component of the xBrowserSync application.
author: xBrowserSync

scripts.build: npm run compilesrc -s && npm run tslint -s && npm run builddocs -s && npm run buildcomplete -s
scripts.compilesrc: echo Compiling source files... && tsc --pretty && n-copy --source src --destination dist config.json
scripts.builddocs: echo Building docs... & npm run builddocsjs & npm run builddocsstyles
scripts.builddocsjs: n-copy --source docs --destination dist/docs **/* && uglifyjs --compress --output dist/docs/js/scripts.min.js -- node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js node_modules/jquery-easing/jquery.easing.1.3.js node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.min.js dist/docs/js/init.js
scripts.builddocsstyles: n-copy --source node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css --destination dist/docs/css bootstrap.min.css && node-sass dist/docs/css/styles.scss dist/docs/css/styles.css -q && minify dist/docs/css/styles.css > dist/docs/css/styles.min.css
